name: Blueberry
description:
Blueberry: Escape from the Murder Factory was written in 3 hours for Trijam #85

Marge has managed to capture you and put you in her murder factory so that she can later turn you into preserves.  Escape the factory to freedom, but watch out as this the further you progress the faster it gets and the harder it becomes to avoid being juiced.

Instructions:

  • Control your blueberry with WASD or the arrow keys while you travel down the conveyor belt to freedom.
  • Avoid the various barrels and saws that are in the path of the conveyor as they will kill you with one touch.
  • Also avoid boxes as they can block you from progressing and you'll die if they push you off-screen.
  • If you need to pause, hit the Escape key.

Background image: https://www.pexels.com/photo/abundance-berries-blueberries-close-up-1153655/
